chapter.title: Overview
chapter.para: The Rackspace &CImS; offers retrieval, storage, and metadata assignment for images through a simple Representational State Transfer (REST) web service interface.

section.title: Images
section.para: Server Images are used to store a snapshot of the server's configuration. If you take an image of the original server, you can create a new server from that image. The new server will be exactly the same as the original server at the time the image was created.
The &CImS; provides operations that allow you to manipulate images, import and export images (using tasks), and to share images with other people.
